t: Amazon Ion data format reference in Amazon QLDB - Amazon Quantum Ledger Database (Amazon QLDB)
s: Ion is an open-source, richly typed, self-describing, hierarchical data serialization format that was originally developed internally at Amazon. It's based on an abstract data model that lets you store both structured and unstructured data. It's a superset of JSON, meaning that any valid JSON ...
